lines.text: Every kid knows who Freddy is. He's like Santa Claus... or King Kong or...
Miss me?

[while walking Heather out of an interview]
I think they'd like to see us together again.
In what, a romantic comedy?
Just because it's a love story doesn't mean it can't have a decapitation or two.
What the hell is going on, Nancy?
Why are you calling me Nancy, John?
Why are you calling me John? Nancy, pull yourself together before you make yourself and that kid nuts.
John! Would you call Robert?
Robert?
Robert Englund. You know, the guy who plays Freddy.
Freddy who?
Freddy Krueger?
Nancy, Freddy's dead. Don't start losing it like your mother did. I love you, sweetheart. Don't forget that.
I love you, too... Daddy.

I think the only way to stop him is to make another movie. Now I swear to you I'll I'm gonna stay by this computer and keep writing until I finish the script, but... when the time comes, you're gonna have to make a choice.
Choice? What kind of choice?
Whether or not you will be willing to play Nancy one last time.
Ma'am this is a restricted area. Do you have a pass?
Screw your pass.
[phone rings]
Hello?
[Heather slams phone down, but answers ring again]
FREDDY'S COMIN' FOR YOU.
Actually, it's been giving me Freddy nightmares.
Wait a second. Now, let me get this straight. You're having nightmares about Freddy? As in me?
No. It isn't you. He's scarier. He's...
Darker? More evil?
How would you like to join us in the definitive Nightmare?
I thought you killed Freddy off.
Well, we did, but the fans, you know, the fans, God bless them, they're clamoring for more. I guess evil never dies, right?
Meet your maker.

[answering the phone]
Hello?
I touched him!
Dylan... until mommy gets back... whatever you do don't fall asleep.
This damn caller.
He's started again? That sick fuck.
Hey, Dillon. Ever play skin the cat?
God wouldn't take me.
Krueger, you bastard! Take Me!
This is still a script, right, Wes?
That was Nancy, Wes. That's not me.
Yeah, but it was you who gave Nancy her strength.
I'm hardly a star.

What, are you kidding? I love your stuff. The first was the best. Where the girlfriend's cut open and dragged across the ceiling. It was awesome. And when all that blood comes ouf your boyfriend's bed? I thought I'd shit. But they never should've killed off Freddy.

[Reading Wes' words in the screenplay]
"Heather, thank you for having the strength to play Nancy one last time. At last, Freddy is back where he belongs. Regards, Wes."
Is it a story?
Yeah, it's a story.
Read me some.

[Reading]
"We open on an old wooden bench. There's fire and tools in the background, and what looks like a pair of hands building what is revealed to be a set of shiny claws. The claws are moving now, as if awakening from a long, and unwanted sleep. Slowly, the man places a trembling hand onto the bench. Behind the lights; people watch in silence, ready to laugh, or scream out in terror..."
Nancyyyyyy.
Are you ready to become Nancy once again?

[Pushing Heather's face into a floor full of snakes]
Pick a pet for the rug rat, bitch.

[jabs an eel into Freddy's eye]
Fuck you!
[Punches Freddy in the face]
Come here, my piggy. I've got some gingerbread for you.
Get the full anesthetic, stat.
We don't have that here, doctor.
No anesthetic, you say? Screw it, then. I'm going in. Little booger's full of something I don't like.
[wearing Freddy's claw]
Let's get him open, good and proper. Cut this evil out of him.

[Trying to stay awake at wheel]
Come on, come on, come on, come on, come oooooooonnnnnnnnn.
